unnormalised: Dr. Rajesh Kumar, MD Pediatrics, recommends the MMR vaccine at 15 months and a follow-up appointment on 02/05/2024 for baby Aisha, as per the latest guidelines from IMA.
normalised: Doctor Rajesh Kumar, M-D Pediatrics, recommends the M-M-R vaccine at fifteen months and a follow-up appointment on second May two thousand and twenty four for baby Aisha, as per the latest guidelines from I-M-A.
